text: Ramona Lofton (born August 4, 1950), better known by her pen name Sapphire, is an American author and performance poet. She is known for her 1996 novel Push, which later became an Academy Award-nominated movie titled Precious (2009).Interview with David Cohen, This is London, 13 January 2010 == Related pages == *List of poets from North America ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:American novelists Category:American poets Category:Writers from California
title: Sapphire (author)
